data.eml:eml: Information and methods specific to the Beach Monitoring Project (BMP) can be found on the Anemoon Foundation website.The BMP form does not yet contain any links to pages about individual species, unlike the UBM form. A project is currently ongoing to provide species descriptions for the BMP project and a BMP form with links to webpages with species information. Beach inventory surveys are always led by an experienced observer.Dataset available via https://www.ndff.nl/english / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nlPositive observations without zeros.29,798 records (March 2018)https://www.ndff.nl/overdendff/validatie/protocollen/4-003-strand-monitoring-project/
